column4: can I just ask a question, or is there a polite way to wait in line? :-)

however, I can open synaptic from the terminal with sudo synaptic
gksu gives me the same incorrect password error; gksudo synaptic works
gksu gives me the same incorrect password error; gksudo synaptic works

while sudo des
does*
I get su: Authentication Failure
sudo su -
that works
what are you actually trying to do?
just to open synaptic
gksudo synaptic
one sec; I tried the fix
it's often helpful to create a new user when testing a new desktop environment
yeah, I know that now
you should have seen the extent to which I broke everything lol
sounds like the time i decided to try every desktop I could find, all on the same user
on Gnome I actually got rid of all the panels and was using a mac-like dock
but then I got rid of the dock by mistake
a good dock like Docky won't give that problem
